ComicInfo.Summary: Cassie learns that the pop star she is trying to save from a slasher is actually an avatar of the Neflords who plans on using the power of his fame to open a portal to their dire dimension.
ComicInfo.Title: Orphans of the Air Part Two; Hoax Hunters Part Seven; Fame Monster Part 2
ComicInfo.Writer: Tim Seeley,James Lowder,Steve Seeley,Michael Moreci,James Lowder,Steve Seeley,Michael Moreci,Tim Seeley
